artist: designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; mill: Parry Murray & Co. Ltd.; producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Handwoven double weave cotton and silk cloth with varying yarn thickness which produces a quilted effect. Tumbling blocks pattern in green, dark blue and various shades of redish brown enhances this effect. Cotton and silk Jacquard triple weave. Poppy

title: Equation
